data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: The book Ulysses was temporarily banned in the United States for sexual content. The ____ was ____ to ____. It ____ argued ____ the ____ of ____ book ____ against ____ freedom ____ expression. The court then ruled that the book was allowed to be published.
data.partBlankContent: The book Ulysses was temporarily banned in the United States for sexual content. The is___ was bro____ to co___. It w__ argued th__ the ban____ of t__ book we__ against t__ freedom o_ expression. The court then ruled that the book was allowed to be published.
data.fullContent: The book Ulysses was temporarily banned in the United States for sexual content. The issue was brought to court. It was argued that the banning of the book went against the freedom of expression. The court then ruled that the book was allowed to be published.
data.answer: 在美国，《尤利西斯》因涉及性内容被暂时禁书。这个问题被提交法庭。有人争辩说，禁止这本书是违反言论自由的。法院随后裁定该书可以出版。
